name: Reviewing TWO Classes on the SAME Etihad Flight *First & Business Class*
description:
Go to https://www.nordvpn.com/trektrendy or use coupon trektrendy to get a 2-year plan plus 1 additional month with 70% off, only £2.63 a month!

Today I’m flying on both First Class and Business Class onboard Etihad’s 787 Dreamliner. Not seen before on YouTube, one person reviewing both products on the same flight! This should be an interesting one. 

I’m flying for 15 hours from Abu Dhabi international airport over to New York City in the USA. Etihad recently announced their intention to discontinue their A380 and 777 which leaves just the 787 with their First Class product. 

Follow my travels live on IG: will.luxurytravel

ETIHAD AIRWAYS ALL CLASS TAKEOVER | Residence, First Class, Business and Economy
Brutally Honest Review of Etihad’s A380 First Class Apartment
ETIHAD FIRST CLASS EXPERIENCE !
